remarks.format: ## Remarks 在这种方式中指定单个字节可用于绕过的计算机的特定类型的字节顺序限制 （big endian 或 little-endian 字节顺序）。Specifying individual bytes in this manner can be used to circumvent byte order restrictions (big-endian or little-endian byte order) on particular types of computers.
